Text: Re Staff Question re Bellak called to say that Gulf was providing the needed technical information Let me know if I can help I may be able to help with the staff but I dont want to interfere with a Gulf presentation Let me know p Russell I reviewed this with our business guys and they were fine with what you represent here We did not check this with Tom Balcerowiz and he needs to take a look at it Have your technical people gotten with Tom yet on any of these issues If not then we can run it down on this end Our only concern was that reliability between Gulfs kv system and AECs kv system was not addressed It was our understanding that this was a question of the PSC staff Are there plans to provide any information concerning this item or is no information available from AEC for such assessment Any word concerning WFECs response to our petition or any filings they have made with the PSC Russell A Badders To eggslan cc ecom Subject Staff Question re AM Please review the attached document Mr Bryant and possibly Tom on your end may want to see this before it goes I hope to transmit this to PSC Staff Thursday March Thanks Russell See attached file staffissuedocdoc

Re Response to AEC letterSee my edits I will call soon Bill AM Bill Attached is our reponse to the letter we received from AEC I made a few changes to Chriss version Please review and let me know if you have any suggestions If possible we would like to send this out today See attached file Project BlackwaterAEC Response Letter adoc Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon et al East College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should immediately notify the sender by EMAIL and by telephone and obtain instructions as to the disposal of the transmitted material In no event shall this material be read used copied reproduced stored or retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you Project BlackwaterAEC Response Letter adoc

ContentType multipartmixed boundaryBCACC Bill Chris Hilgers letter appears confrontational and inflammatory Im sure that the letter to which he is responding is similarly belligerent However if Enrons goal is to avoid litigation and expense in this matter this letter does not work toward that goal Unless there is some strategic reason to respond with specific dates and conversations I think the only necessary sentences in paragraph one are one and three Only the first sentence as amended is necessary in paragraph two See my proposed revisions attached Natalie Bill L Bryant AM here you go WFLANonPrivilegedpst Gerald Where are we in the process of gathering emails and other discovery that may be responsive to WFLAs request Also can I tell John Haswell that our contract with Gulf does contain a confidentiality clause We discussed this but I cant remember if we agreed that I could disclose it Bill Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon et al East College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should immediately notify the sender by EMAIL and by telephone and obtain instructions as to the disposal of the transmitted material In no event shall this material be read used copied reproduced stored or retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you

RE WFLANonPrivilegedpst Gerald Thanks for reminding me about where we stand on this issue I sent John the draft affidavit and I think the best course is to wait for his response If he asks about matters other than the draft Ill have to check with the client and get back to him That will give us time to formulate our response Bill Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon et al East College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should immediately notify the sender by EMAIL and by telephone and obtain instructions as to the disposal of the transmitted material In no event shall this material be read used copied reproduced stored or retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you AM Bill The contract itself does not have a confidentiality clause but per Jeff Stones email Gulf does consider the contract proprietary information and does not want this info voluntarily disclosed at this time I forwarded the email to you earlier Concerning the emails etc as I mentioned before ECS has a copy of a Confidentiality Agreement that we executed by Gulf initialed by me as ECS attorney but not signed by an officer of ECS Our business guys think we executed this agreement This CA would cover all information exchanged between Gulf and ECS I have asked Russell Badders to check with Gulf to obtain an executed copy Nothing in the CA agreements prohibit me from disclosing the CA So we could potentially provide the copy of the CA we have to John Obviously the correspondence between ECS and Gulf contains the commerical terms of our power deal as we negotiated with Gulf Given Jeffs email and the CA copy I have in hand I would not want to disclose the emails and memos without Gulfs explicit permission Let me know if you have any ideas on the best way to approach this with WFLA Original Message From Bill L Bryant ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESBillLEBryantCBILLkatzlawEcomE NRONcom Sent Sunday July PM To Nemec Gerald Subject WFLA Gerald Where are we in the process of gathering emails and other discovery that may be responsive to WFLAs request Also can I tell John Haswell that our contract with Gulf does contain a confidentiality clause We discussed this but I cant remember if we agreed that I could disclose it Bill Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon et al East College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you

Fwd WFEC vs Gulf Power Territorial DisputeNonPrivilegedpst Gerald Attached is a request for informal discovery in this docket Please call when you return Bill Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon et al East College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should immediately notify the sender by EMAIL and by telephone and obtain instructions as to the disposal of the transmitted material In no event shall this material be read used copied reproduced stored or retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you Received from imodmxaolcom by mailkatzlawcom Fri Jun Received from by imodmxaolcom mailoutv id pced for Fri Jun EDT From MessageID Date Fri Jun EDT Subject WFEC vs Gulf Power Territorial Dispute To MIMEVersion ContentType multipartmixed boundarypartcedbcboundary XMailer AOL for Windows sub Dear Mr Bryant Mr Haswell asked me to email the attachments to you Attached hereto is a letter from Mr Haswell to you Informal Interrogatories to ECS and an Informal Document Production Request If you should have any questions regarding the attachments please do not hesitate to call Debby Jerrels Assistant to John H Haswell Chandler Lang Haswell Cole PA telephone BYRANTZIP

Fwd Conference callNonPrivilegedpst Gerald Attached is an email from my associate who listened in to a conference call today among Gulf West Florida and the PSC staff Call when you return to the office Bill Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon et al East College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you ContentTransferEncoding quotedprintable Date Fri Jun From Natalie FUTCH To Bill L Bryant Subject Conference call MimeVersion ContentType textplain charsetusascii ContentDisposition inline Bill The conference call was to discuss the Staffs draft of issues to be resolved in the territorial dispute I can give you further information about the issues and participants in the call if you like Staff will make recommendations to the Commission regarding the issues In regard to the time line nothing has been posted on the Internet Commissioner Jaber is the prehearing officer The due date for submission of testimony is July Rebuttal testimony will be due weeks later Aug The prehearing conference is August and the hearing is set for September Natalie Natalie B Futch associate Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon PA E College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL phone facsimile wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or West Florida DiscoveryNonPrivilegedpst Gerald This is a followup to my earlier email about the discovery request from John Haswell Perhaps you have already spoken to him Im traveling today and tomorrow On vacation next week I am in the office Friday and reachable much of the week when not on an airplane Call when you can Bill Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon et al East College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should immediately notify the sender by EMAIL and by telephone and obtain instructions as to the disposal of the transmitted material In no event shall this material be read used copied reproduced stored or retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you

Fwd John Haswell within the hour Office NonPrivilegedpst FYI Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon et al East College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should immediately notify the sender by EMAIL and by telephone and obtain instructions as to the disposal of the transmitted material In no event shall this material be read used copied reproduced stored or retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you ContentTransferEncoding quotedprintable Date Fri Jun From Annette Fontenot To Bill L Bryant Daphne E Gilbert Subject John Haswell within the hour Office MimeVersion ContentType textplain charsetusascii ContentDisposition inline Item Type Phone Caller John Haswell Phone within the hour Office X Telephoned X Please Call Will Call Again Returned Your Call Wants to See You Came to See You Urgent He would like to talk to you about the request he sent out for ENRON He tells that it has been two weeks and he would like to know if further action is necessary

Re Revised Answer Cc NonPrivilegedpst See my edits in italics Looks good to me Bill Nemec Gerald Gerald NRONcom PM Please review and provide any input as soon as possible Bill I still have not talked with Jeff Stone WFECs Document Production Responsedoc WFECs Interrogatories Responsedoc Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon et al East College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should immediately notify the sender by EMAIL and by telephone and obtain instructions as to the disposal of the transmitted material In no event shall this material be read used copied reproduced stored or retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you WFECs Interrogatories Responsedoc WFECs Document Production Responsedoc

Re Revised AnswerNonPrivilegedpst Gerald Haswell will be working tomorrow He will not be in Thursday or Friday I can call him tomorrow and that will give you the remainder of the afternoon to circulate your responses I have to leave shortly for a dentists appointment of long standing You could call Haswell if you prefer but I think it better that I act as buffer You can always fire me if I screw up Bill Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon et al East College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should immediately notify the sender by EMAIL and by telephone and obtain instructions as to the disposal of the transmitted material In no event shall this material be read used copied reproduced stored or retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you

Re ResponsesNonPrivilegedpst John Sorry during our telephone conference yesterday I should have been more precise about these documents I have the technical specifications in fax form but I was not able to send them yesterday I will have clear originals by FedEx today and will fax them this afternoon and send them by overnight for delivery in your office Friday About the GPCECS contract we are trying to determine if GPC has a claim of confidentiality that they believe would prevent ECS from disclosing some or all of the contract without their approval ECS has no objection to producing the contract and I hope that we can get this resolved quickly Enjoy your weekend Bill Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon et al East College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should immediately notify the sender by EMAIL and by telephone and obtain instructions as to the disposal of the transmitted material In no event shall this material be read used copied reproduced stored or retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you

Re ResponsesNonPrivilegedpst John I also sent a fax of the specs to your office yesterday So you can get that copy early and not wait for FedEx if you choose If what you receive is not what you expected email or call Im here all day I hope reading this material doesnt destroy your weekend Bill Katz Kutter Haigler Alderman Bryant Yon et al East College Avenue Suite Tallahassee FL wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should immediately notify the sender by EMAIL and by telephone and obtain instructions as to the disposal of the transmitted material In no event shall this material be read used copied reproduced stored or retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you PM Thank you I was in the office only for an hour today left at am for af amily gathering but I will be in the office tomorrow morning for the fed ex John Haswell

Re Staff Question re Bellak called to say that Gulf was providing the needed technical information Let me know if I can help I may be able to help with the staff but I dont want to interfere with a Gulf presentation Let me know p Russell I reviewed this with our business guys and they were fine with what you represent here We did not check this with Tom Balcerowiz and he needs to take a look at it Have your technical people gotten with Tom yet on any of these issues If not then we can run it down on this end Our only concern was that reliability between Gulfs kv system and AECs kv system was not addressed It was our understanding that this was a question of the PSC staff Are there plans to provide any information concerning this item or is no information available from AEC for such assessment Any word concerning WFECs response to our petition or any filings they have made with the PSC Russell A Badders To eggslan cc ecom Subject Staff Question re AM Please review the attached document Mr Bryant and possibly Tom on your end may want to see this before it goes I hope to transmit this to PSC Staff Thursday March Thanks Russell See attached file staffissuedocdoc
